mapper.select: SELECT od.odSituation ,od.odDate ,od.product_pdSeq ,od.address_adSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,ad.adName ,ad.ad1 ,ad.ad2 ,ad.ad3 ,pd.pdSeq FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product pd ON od.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq LEFT JOIN address ad ON od.address_adSeq = ad.adSeq WHERE 1=1 AND ad.member_mmSeq = #{mmSeq}
